name: FlowHippo Abandoned Cart Recovery
author: Ajith Kumar VM

sections.description:
A support plugin to the most intuitive and easy to use tool for e-commerce merchants. Helps recover your abandoned carts via detailed automation workflows.

– Using FlowHippo (https://flowhippo.com) you can send abandoned cart messages on WhatsApp
– Leverage WhatsApp’s high open rate to recover your abandoned carts on WooCommerce

Link to the service: https://www.flowhippo.com

This plugin will be leveraging FlowHippo’s services to capture information about abandoned carts and subsequently send recovery messages on WhatsApp to your valuable customers. This plugin uses 3rd party services to enable the abandoned cart functionality.

Disclaimer

This plugin enables the functionality of abandoned cart recovery by sending checkout details, including user information, to a third-party server owned by FlowHippo. The collected data is used solely for the purpose of abandoned cart recovery and will not be shared with any other third party without the user’s explicit consent.

By installing this plugin, you agree to the collection and processing of your data as described above. If you do not wish to have your checkout details sent to FlowHippo’s server, please uninstall the plugin.

We take your privacy seriously and will only use your information in accordance with our privacy policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our use of your data, please contact us at contact@zoko.io

Terms and Conditions

https://www.flowhippo.com/published/legal
sections.faq:
Can I send a checkout url for an abandoned cart?

Yes. It’s possible to send the user a checkout url with the products added to cart from flowhippo.com

Can I send customized messages sent to the user for abandoned carts?

Yes. It’s possible to send customized messages and rich templates on WhatsApp
